name: codeceptjs-jenkins
description: step 1: npm init -y  step 2: npm install codeceptjs webdriverio --save-dev  step 3: npx codeceptjs init  step 4: npm install @wdio/selenium-standalone-service --save-dev  step 5: wdio: {enabled: true,services: ['selenium-standalone']},  step 6: npx codeceptjs run   step 7: change chrome to firefox and run Test
